channel.description: Recent content in RSS on systems++

item.title: Learning to Learn: Intake
item.description: From time to time I get questions about how I stay apprised on all of the topics that I know something about. The short answer is a lot of reading and listening. I make extensive use of RSS Feeds and Podcasts as part of my information intake process. In this post, I provide the list of principles that I use to manage the list of information sources that I use.
